package step2;

public class AlarmGuardDoor extends Door implements Alarm, Guard {

	public void open() {
		System.out.println("芝麻开门");
	}
	
	public void close() {
		System.out.println("芝麻关门");
	}
    
	@Override
	public void guard() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("防盗效果好");
	}

	@Override
	public void alarm() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("刮风下雨收衣服了");
	}

}
